snippet.title: Resistance - Burning Skies Trailer
snippet.description:
They came from the skies, wiping out all of New York. But one man will not stand for this. His loved ones trapped in NY still, he will do whatever it takes to get them back. See the trailer of his vengeance and let us know what you think!

Release Date: May 29, 2012
Exclusively on: PlayStation Vita 
Genre: First-Person Shooter 
Publisher: Sony Computer Entertainment
Developer: Nihilistic

Snipe away over at IGN:
http://vita.ign.com/objects/098/098912.html

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
